alert.note: Alert for La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 3:42AM MST until February 17 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...The La Garita mountains and higher elevations of Fremont County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions which will continue into the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft
